segments.text: Hello , is this the ABC company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have just arrived from Tokyo only ... looking for a reserve car of your company . All of above , we cannot find it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Oh , yes , we have your reservation number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you haven ’ t arranged any car ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry to say no .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here I ’ ll take taxi instead , how do you refund us ?
segments.speaker: S1
